ISSUE.TITLE: Feature: open user registration
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I would like to be able to allow open registration for my instance of NocoDB so anyone can create an account. Currently it seems like you need to invite all new users, which makes the "Don't have an account ? Sign Up" link on the sign in page very confusing. When I try to register a new account it gives the error `Not allowed to signup, contact super admin.` ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2007008/122134832-60de2500-ce0d-11eb-8db8-687f73a0432f.png)
